text:
Created attachment 24185
Screen shot

Some GUI compenents are being truncated, no matter what size I make JMeter's
window (please see attachment for an example). The problem only happens when
using the default "Metal" L&F.

The problem is not limited to that shown in the example - I have also seen it
for:

The "Not" checkbox in "Response Assertion"
"Stop Test" in Thread Group.
"Show Text" in "View Results Tree"

My Java version is:

C:\Documents and Settings\paulcager>java -version
java version "1.7.0-ea"
Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (build 1.7.0-ea-b55)
Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (build 15.0-b05, mixed mode, sharing)
creator: paul-debian@home.paulcager.org

text:
JMeter has not been tested with Java Jdk early version 7.0.
Try to use with the last stable version Jdk (aka 6.0)
creator: milamber@apache.org

text: Cannot reproduce on Java 1.5 or Java 1.6
creator: sebb@apache.org
